name: Heidegger
description: Some work from the 1920s (either Being and Time or contemporary lectures) and selections from Heideggers later work on poetry, technology, and history are studied. Heidegger's position within phenomenology and within the broader history of thought is charted.
prerequisites: PHL217H1, 7.5 courses (in any field) with at least 1.5 in philosophy
